DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , double blind study compare efficacy pegylated interferon-alfa2a plus placebo versus pegylated interferon-alfa2a plus tenofovir treatment chronic delta hepatitis . 70 Patients randomize 1:1 two group . Treatment duration : 96 week . Follow-up : 24 week . Long-term-follow-up : week 358 .
